scan_script_only_check.description: Documenting artifacts such as configurations, customizations, and workflows ensures that knowledge about the ServiceNow instance is captured and shared among team members. This helps new team members onboard quickly and allows existing members to refer back to documentation when needed. Also well-documented artifacts make it easier to maintain and troubleshoot the ServiceNow instance. Documentation provides insights into the purpose and functionality of various components, enabling administrators and developers to identify and address issues efficiently.

scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Add an informative description and, whenever possible, a ticket ID for referencing further details.
